name: Compliance Dashboard Navigation
description: Back Office Users can access and navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module to view companies list

background.text: I am on the application at https://test.com
I am logged in as a Back Office User

scenarios.name: Back Office User successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be redirected to the Compliance Dashboard page
I should see the companies list view
the companies list should contain records of all companies

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module displays with correct title

steps.text: I am on the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display the title "Compliance Dashboard"

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module is visible for Back Office User role

steps.text: I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should be visible
the module should be accessible for interaction

scenarios.name: Companies list view loads with all company records

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
the companies list view should load
I should see all company records displayed
the list should not be empty

scenarios.name: Navigation maintains user session after clicking module

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should remain logged in as Back Office User
my session should be maintained
I should have access to the Compliance Dashboard features

scenarios.name: Multiple clicks on module do not cause errors

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module multiple times
the navigation should work correctly
no error messages should appear
I should see the companies list view

scenarios.name: Module is not accessible when user is not logged in

steps.text: I am not logged in
I navigate to the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should not be visible
I should be redirected to the login page

scenarios.name: Invalid user role cannot access Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am logged in with a non-Back Office User role
I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should not be visible
I should not have access to compliance features

scenarios.name: Network error during navigation shows appropriate message

steps.text: I am on the home page
there is a network connectivity issue
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see an appropriate error message
the application should handle the error gracefully

scenarios.name: Module remains functional after browser refresh

steps.text: I am on the home page
I refresh the browser page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
the navigation should work correctly
I should see the companies list view

scenarios.name: Module works with keyboard navigation accessibility

steps.text: I am on the home page
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using keyboard
I press Enter to activate the module
I should be redirected to the Compliance Dashboard page
the companies list view should load

scenarios.name: Back navigation works after accessing dashboard

steps.text: I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I click the browser back button
I should return to the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible

gherkin_content:
Feature: Compliance Dashboard Navigation
  Back Office Users can access and navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module to view companies list

  Background:
    Given I am on the application at https://test.com
    And I am logged in as a Back Office User

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Back Office User successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be redirected to the Compliance Dashboard page
    And I should see the companies list view
    And the companies list should contain records of all companies

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module displays with correct title
    Given I am on the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should display the title "Compliance Dashboard"

  @positive @authorization
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module is visible for Back Office User role
    Given I am on the home page
    Then the Compliance Dashboard module should be visible
    And the module should be accessible for interaction

  @positive @data
  Scenario: Companies list view loads with all company records
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then the companies list view should load
    And I should see all company records displayed
    And the list should not be empty

  @positive @session
  Scenario: Navigation maintains user session after clicking module
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should remain logged in as Back Office User
    And my session should be maintained
    And I should have access to the Compliance Dashboard features

  @positive @stability
  Scenario: Multiple clicks on module do not cause errors
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module multiple times
    Then the navigation should work correctly
    And no error messages should appear
    And I should see the companies list view

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Module is not accessible when user is not logged in
    Given I am not logged in
    And I navigate to the home page
    Then the Compliance Dashboard module should not be visible
    And I should be redirected to the login page

  @negative @authorization
  Scenario: Invalid user role cannot access Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am logged in with a non-Back Office User role
    When I am on the home page
    Then the Compliance Dashboard module should not be visible
    And I should not have access to compliance features

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Network error during navigation shows appropriate message
    Given I am on the home page
    And there is a network connectivity issue
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And the application should handle the error gracefully

  @edge-case @browser
  Scenario: Module remains functional after browser refresh
    Given I am on the home page
    When I refresh the browser page
    And I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then the navigation should work correctly
    And I should see the companies list view

  @edge-case @accessibility
  Scenario: Module works with keyboard navigation accessibility
    Given I am on the home page
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using keyboard
    And I press Enter to activate the module
    Then I should be redirected to the Compliance Dashboard page
    And the companies list view should load

  @alternative-flow
  Scenario: Back navigation works after accessing dashboard
    Given I have navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    When I click the browser back button
    Then I should return to the home page
    And the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible
